医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究表明，与纳米塑料相互作用会改变抗生素活性纳米塑料显着改变抗生素的相互作用，降低有效性并增加耐药性，对健康和生态造成严重影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Antibiotic-activity-altered-by-interaction-with-nano Plastics-new-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Antibiotic-activity-altered-by-interaction-with-nano Plastics-new-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=667f4777-5b90-4a5b-8303-6d264f81d32e Wed, 20 Nov 2024 04:51:00 -0500 Antibiotic activity altered by interaction with nanoplastics, new research shows
有限的空间和压力改变了人们对食物香气的感知皇家墨尔本理工大学的新研究发现，封闭和隔离的环境改变了人们对某些食物香气的嗅觉和情感反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Confined-spaces-and-stress-alter-how-people-perceive-food-aromas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Confined-spaces-and-stress-alter-how-people-perceive-food-aromas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=851738c0-5618-4c63-8f34-99e3f9af2ba8 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:55:38 -0500 Confined spaces and stress alter how people perceive food aromas
与运动相关的心脏骤停的生存机会明显更高大多数运动期间发生的心脏骤停病例是可以预防的。此外，在体育运动中使用心肺复苏（CPR）和除颤器的紧急反应也可以得到改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Survival-chances-found-to-be-significantly-better-for-sports-lated-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Survival-chances-found-to-be-significantly-better-for-sports-lated-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46a16ad2-a0b5-407b-9f8d-d091669f97fc Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:32:00 -0500 Survival chances found to be significantly better for sports-related cardiac arrest
SARS-CoV-2 劫持胆固醇贩运以加剧感染并逃避免疫反应SARS-CoV-2 利用其 ORF3a 蛋白将胆固醇隔离在溶酶体中，从而破坏胆固醇代谢，降低 BMP 水平并优化病毒存活。这种新颖的机制为了解 COVID-19 的长期代谢并发症提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-cholesterol-trafficking-to-fuel-infection-and-evade-immune-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-cholesterol-trafficking-to-fuel-infection-and-evade-immune-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee54a2fc-db9e-4357-b91c-6112141a9673 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:26:00 -0500 SARS-CoV-2 hijacks cholesterol trafficking to fuel infection and evade immune responses
九州大学团队开发出对抗年龄相关肌肉萎缩的抗体我们都老了。尽管人类的预期寿命在现代显着增加，但随着年龄的增长，我们的身体仍然面临着不可避免的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/九州大学-team-develops-antibody-to-fight-age-lated-muscle-atropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/九州大学-team-develops-antibody-to-fight-age-lated-muscle-atropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8e02232-226e-49c0-8078-643a94c41395 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:14:00 -0500 Kyushu University team develops antibody to fight age-related muscle atrophy
糖尿病药物可将哮喘发作率降低高达 70%，重塑治疗方案二甲双胍和 GLP-1 受体激动剂可显着减少 2 型糖尿病患者的哮喘发作，为哮喘提供潜在的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Diabetes-drugs-cut-asthma-attacks-by-up-to-7025-reshaping-treatment-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Diabetes-drugs-cut-asthma-attacks-by-up-to-7025-reshaping-treatment-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94199b58-d313-4f5d-bb72-8bcf3c7e8f4c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:00:00 -0500 Diabetes drugs cut asthma attacks by up to 70%, reshaping treatment options
多走路，活得更久：新研究揭示了体力活动的延长寿命的力量增加体力活动，即使是适度的活动，也可以显着延长预期寿命，其中在 40 岁及以上最不活跃的人群中观察到的益处最大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Walk-more-live-longer-New-study-reveals-the-life-extending-power-of-physical-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Walk-more-live-longer-New-study-reveals-the-life-extending-power-of-physical-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08699f5f-c7ed-4d6a-bfe7-221200eeb80b Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:35:00 -0500 Walk more, live longer: New study reveals the life-extending power of physical activity
互联网的使用促进了全球老年人的心理健康23 个国家/地区使用互联网的老年人的心理健康得到了改善，包括抑郁症状减少和生活满意度提高，其益处因人口和遗传因素而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Internet-use-boosts-mental-health-for-older-adults-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Internet-use-boosts-mental-health-for-older-adults-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5561d30-2350-4fb6-8a6a-ad823b522313 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:16:00 -0500 Internet use boosts mental health for older adults worldwide
放射学中的人工智能解释可能导致过度依赖根据美国放射学会杂志《放射学》今天发表的一项研究，在做出诊断决定时，放射科医生和其他医生可能会过度依赖人工智能 (AI)，因为人工智能会指出 X 射线中感兴趣的特定区域。北美（RSNA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/AI-explanations-in-radiology-can-lead-to-over-reliance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/AI-explanations-in-radiology-can-lead-to-over-reliance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ec6ca98-5bcd-4b6f-8aa1-014cef179e05 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:12:00 -0500 AI explanations in radiology can lead to over-reliance
新的蛋白质靶标有望缓解帕金森病的认知能力下降亚利桑那大学健康科学中心的研究人员最近发表的一项研究发现，一种名为 PNA5 的微小蛋白质似乎对脑细胞具有保护作用，这可能有助于治疗帕金森病和相关疾病的认知症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New- Protein-target-offers-promise-for-allevating-cognitive-decline-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New- Protein-target-offers-promise-for-allevating-cognitive-decline-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e26415d5-3294-4921-83a2-a63822409a60 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 21:57:13 -0500 New protein target offers promise for alleviating cognitive decline in Parkinson's disease
